title: tiurunaTanam kANa vENDum
sahitya:
tirunaTanam kANa vENDum prabhO marupaDi mAniDa piravi kiDaikkumO


anupallavi

  uruvam maruvum enra tIvinai tANDi uNarum tanil un arivAgi nIyADum


caraNam    Ezhpuruvam naDuvil tiriyum manam aDanga turiyamAm eNNiyil parivoDu uyir tilakka undan
turiyAt-tIram ETrum shikharam kaDandE pUjA shiva vENiyil jalarttiDumE undan
